name: World of Darkness: Shadowplay
description:
This is my entry for the Vampire:  The Masquerade game jam 2021.

Unfortunately due to my dreadful coding skills I couldn't get as much done as I'd hoped, and the game is incomplete but you should get a taste for the kind of thing I had in mind.

After the second simple fight, you'll be unceremoniously dumped back at the main menu.

If anyone out there would like to help with coding this project going forward then please let me know. Specifically I had serious problems with the turn based system for the enemies. I think it has potential, but my programming skills are simply not up to the standards required.

Anyway, thanks for trying it out and I hope you enjoy what there is.
